metadata.title: CVE-2014-9795 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: app/aboot/aboot.c in the Qualcomm components in Android before 2016-07-05on Nexus 5 devices does not properly check for an integer overflow, whichallows attackers to bypass intended access restrictions via crafted startand size values, aka Android internal bug 28820720 and Qualcomm internalbug CR681957, a related issue to CVE-2014-4325.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
